Class Student

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.Student
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Student extends Object implements Comparable<Student>
A class for representing a student.

    • addAttainment

      public void addAttainment(CourseUnit course, boolean passed, int grade)
      Adds a new attainment for student and updates student's credit count and average grade. If student has previously completed the same course, existing attainment gets replaced with the new one.
      Parameters:
      course - the course that has been completed
      passed - true if the course was passed, false if not
      grade - numeric grade on scale 0-5
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if grade is not between 0 and 5

    • removeAttainment

      public void removeAttainment(CourseUnit course)
      Removes course from student's attainments
      Parameters:
      course - course to be removed

    • removeAllAttainments

      public void removeAllAttainments()
      Removes all attainments from student.

    • toString

      Returns a string of student number and name.

      Returns:

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Student student)
      Compares two students first by name and then by student number. Makes it possible to sort students in alphabetical order
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Student>
      Parameters:
      student - a student object that this student is being compared to
      Returns:
      result of the comparison as an integer value
